title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Brady Retirement, RGIII on Mahomes & Burrow, Flores Lawsuit with Mike Silver + Harbaugh with Wannstedt
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Brady Retirement, RGIII on Mahomes & Burrow, Flores Lawsuit with Mike Silver + Harbaugh with Wannstedt
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, Colin's top takes of the week as he gives his thoughts on Tom Brady's retirement after 22 NFL Seasons and 7 Super Bowls (3:00). Then, former NFL QB and ESPN analyst Robert Griffin III discusses what went wrong with Mahomes in the second half of the AFC Championship, and why Joe Burrow's youth is actually an advantage (11:00) Next, Longtime NFL writer Mike Silver reacts to ex-Dolphins head coach Brian Flores' bombshell discrimination lawsuit against the league (22:00). And finally, former Dolphins & Bears HC Dave Wannstedt joins Colin to discuss the Flores' lawsuit , why he wanted Jim Harbaugh to coach the Chicago Bears, and why he thought Harbaugh would join the Minnesota Vikings (31:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
